category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA113_DWF_by_publish_select_mode
preference.preference_description: Configure the content of DWF files generated via PUBLISH command. This option is taken into consideration only if TCAA113_DWF_generation_mode is set to 1. Possible values: 0 - Publish just the current model space or layout (Default) 1 - Publish the model space only 2 - Publish only the layout(s) with specific index or name (see preferences TCAA113_DWF_by_publish_layout_num and TCAA113_DWF_by_publish_layout_name) 3 - Publish all the layouts 4 - Publish the model space and all the layouts
